  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120538</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Bližnji in oddaljeni pogled na žico</string>
            <string language="en">Near and Far View of a Filament</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahe und weite Ansicht eines Heizfadens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Près de et vue lointaine d'un filament</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perto e vista distante de um filamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vicino e vista lontana di un filamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοντά και μακρινή όψη μιας ίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cerca y vista lejana de un filamento</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Različni pogledi na isto naelektreno žico in električni pretok skozi premično Gaussovo ploskev.</string>
            <string language="en">Different views on the same system - charged wire and electric flux through the movable Gaussian surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni pretok</string>
            <string language="en">electric flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gaussov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">gauss's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Ansichten über das gleiche 
System - belastete Leitung und elektrischer Fluß durch die bewegliche
Gaußsche Oberfläche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentes vues sur le même système - fil 
charge et flux électrique par la surface gaussienne mobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vistas diferentes no mesmo sistema - fio 
carregado e fluxo elétrico através da superfície gaussian móvel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viste differenti sullo stesso sistema - legare 
caricato e cambiamento continuo elettrico attraverso la superficie 
gaussiana mobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικές όψεις σχετικά με το ίδιο σύστημα - 
χρεωμένο καλώδιο και ηλεκτρικό συλλίπασμα μέσω της κινητής 
γκαουσσιανής επιφάνειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas opiniónes sobre el mismo sistema - 
alambre cargado y flux eléctrico a través de la superficie gaussian 
movible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Gausss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi du gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος Gaoy'</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del gauss</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
